item.title: Simulating Frc Robots
item.description: Alright! Big project writeup time. I’ve recently been messing around with improving the simulation capabilities of my FRC team, 2537: The Space RAIDers. In the process of doing this I’ve done a lot of interesting things, so I’m putting them on paper so other people can learn from what I’ve done.
